long_description: Look as stylish as an urban sophisticate, but feel prepared to explore the wild with the Arc'teryx Cordetta Long coat, a breathable, waterproof coat that raises protection by lowering its hemline. Abrasion-resistant 3-layer Gore-Tex(R) nylon fabric provides waterproof, windproof protection with minimum weight. Mid-thigh length increases warmth by guarding more of your body from wind and rain; relaxed fit allows for layering underneath. Articulated sleeves and gusseted underarms allow full range of motion without the jacket riding up. Arc'teryx Codetta Long coat features 2 hand pockets for easy storage.
short_description: Look as stylish as an urban sophisticate, but feel prepared to explore the wild with the Arc'teryx Cordetta Long coat, a breathable, waterproof coat that raises protection by lowering its hemline.
